title: Prestigious House in Marawila for Sale
details:
• 4500 square feet two storied house (with furniture) located in a peaceful, quiet environment.
• 123.4 perch land. Spacious garden with an ample parking area.
• The house is FULLY TILED. 8 bed rooms, 6 attached washrooms, living room, large dining area, pantry, garage, wooden floored upstairs, corridors and 2 additional bathrooms.
• 3 phase power facility, water tank.
• 1 Km to the Marawila beach. 1 Km to the Colombo-Chilaw main road. 1 hour drive from the Colombo Airport.
